data.title: URL Not Found... Jerry (the usher) will help you
meta_keywords: Film Films Cannes Riviera Hollywood Indies Reviews Independent Feature Sundance inform Movies Cinema Comment Commentary Market Coverage Reports Diary Diaries Interviews Riesman
data.meta_description: Festival Coverage by Film Scouts, an independent site with original programming, movie trailers and stills, interviews, information, humor, reviews, and commentary.
data.text:
Hi, I'm Jerry, I work here. Do you need some help?...

Well, it appears that either you're looking for something that has moved, or is no longer here, or perhaps you got the URL wrong, so I thought maybe you needed some assistance...

So, I can show you what's playing by category or by location, or what's new, or...

I'll show you to the Concession Stand, where you can buy something, or...

I can give you some tips about getting around, or...

I can recommend the following software for attending, or...

I can tell you something about us, or show you a credit list, or...

I've put together a little scrapbook of clippings about us, or...

If you're looking for something different, I've got some of my own stuff, or...

I'll point you to some of my favorite websites, or...

I can show you a studio directory, or...

I can get you information on sponsoring Film Scouts, or...
